TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FocusNavigationDirection extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the direction within a user interface (UI) in which a desired focus change request is attempted. The direction is either based on tab order or by relative direction in layout.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Left, Right, Down, and Up each move focus in that direction based on an approximate representation of the relative item positions in the rendered window. Not all such directional movements are possible, depending on the relative layout of your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection Down = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Move focus to another focusable element downwards from the currently focused element.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection First = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Move focus to the first focusable element in tab order. Not supported for .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection Last = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Move focus to the last focusable element in tab order. Not supported for .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection Left = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Move focus to another focusable element to the left of the currently focused element.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection Next = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Move focus to the next focusable element in tab order. Not supported for .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection Previous = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Move focus to the previous focusable element in tab order. Not supported for .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection Right = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Move focus to another focusable element to the right of the currently focused element.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Input.FocusNavigationDirection Up = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Move focus to another focusable element upwards from the currently focused element.
